articles.description: Follow live commentary, text & score updates as Nottingham Forest host Aston Villa & Liverpool face Luton in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Forest v Villa before Liverpool v Luton - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from the Sao Paulo Grand Prix at Interlagos.
articles.title: Sao Paulo Grand Prix build-up

articles.description: Luis Diaz comes off the bench to salvage a point for Liverpool with a stoppage-time goal on his Premier League return at Luton.
articles.title: Diaz dedicates crucial late Liverpool goal to dad

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to radio commentary from five FA Cup first-round matches, plus the round two draw.
articles.title: FA Cup first round: Five games starting with Chesterfield v Portsmouth

articles.description: Listen to radio commentary and follow text updates as Manchester United visit Brighton in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: WSL: Build-up to Brighton v Man Utd - radio & text

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen takes a controlled victory in the Sao Paulo Grand Prix to extend his record for wins in a season to 17.
articles.title: Verstappen wins in Sao Paulo from Norris

articles.description: Nottingham Forest gain their first win in seven matches with a victory over in-form Aston Villa at the City Ground.
articles.title: Forest beat Villa for first win in seven matches

articles.description: Captain James Tavernier scores twice as Rangers eased past Hearts to book a Viaplay Cup final date against Aberdeen on 17 December.
articles.title: Rangers sweep aside Hearts to set up Aberdeen final

articles.description: Virat Kohli equals the record of fellow India great Sachin Tendulkar as he hits his 49th one-day international century against South Africa in Kolkata.
articles.title: Kohli equals Tendulkar record with 49th ODI ton

articles.description: Novak Djokovic wins a record-extending seventh Paris Masters trophy and 40th Masters title in total with a 6-4 6-3 victory over Grigor Dimitrov.
articles.title: Djokovic wins 40th Masters title in Paris
